about_the_game:
Play the DEMO now 👆

WILL THE BEEHIVE MAKE IT THROUGH THE NEXT WINTER?

Winter is coming and the Hive needs resources. Become the Queens' Champion collecting pollen against the clock, facing the environment and sabotaging the other players.
A Party-Game to learn about many astounding details of the bees while having fun sabotaging each other and getting quizzed.

  • Experience the pain and difficulties of a bee trying to collect pollen for her Queen against the clock, the environment and the predators.

  • Survive the unforgiving forces of nature and deal with the consequences of the human-made disasters both of which will attempt to sabotage your mission.

  • Compete with your fellow bees to win the Queen’s recognition and love but always remember that you are all part of the same hive.

FEATURES

LEARN THROUGH PLAY and quiz your knowledge of bee facts

ENJOY MULTIPLE LEVELS facing both merciless mother nature and human pollution

PLAY LOCALLY. Not having internet connection? That won't stop you to play with family and friends up to 6 players from the same PC!

PLAY ONLINE creating a server and going up against people from all over the world

2 PEOPLE 1 KEYBOARD. Get a friend and play together from the same PC using the same keyboard, no extra controller needed

CHOOSE YOUR BEE. Select the character you like the most and become the Queen’s beloved champion!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
